## RestBindings.INVOKE\_MIDDLEWARE\_SERVICE variable

Binding key for setting and injecting a `invokeMiddleware` function for middleware based sequence

**Signature:**

```typescript
INVOKE_MIDDLEWARE_SERVICE: BindingKey<InvokeMiddleware>
```
